title: Zaiton (actress)
text: Zaiton Abdullah (born 2 April 1937) was one of the most popular and talented <a href="Malaysia">Malay</a> <a href="film">film</a> <a href="actress">actress</a>es in the 1950s and 1960s. Zaiton disappeared from the <a href="movie%20industry">movie industry</a> when <a href="Shaw%20Brothers">Shaw Brothers</a> studio <a href="Jalan%20Ampas">Jalan Ampas</a> closed down.
